alert.note: Alert for Logan; McIntosh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 10:23PM CDT until June 29 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Logan County in southeastern North Dakota... Northern McIntosh County in southeastern North Dakota... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1023 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Napoleon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Gackle. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
